ComicInfo.Summary:
Number 3 in the Lobster Johnson series.
Undeterred by his defeat in the jaws of the snake monster, The Lobster springs back into action-but can he find his ally in time? Jim-still in his stolen battle armor-has fallen into the clutches of a mysterious villain who'll stop at nothing to harness the cosmic Vril energy that powers Jim's armor! After years of captivating fans from the pages of Hellboy and B.P.R.D., the pulp-style adventures of Lobster Johnson take the limelight in the Lobster's first solo series. Written and with covers by Hellboy creator Mike Mignola, and drawn by Jason Armstrong (Ferro City, The Sensational Spider-Man).
ComicInfo.Tags: Professor Kyriakos Gallaragas,Helena Gallaragas,Shonchin,Jim Sacks,Lester,Robert Isherwood,Bill,Memnan Saa,Harry McTell,The Lobster
ComicInfo.Title: The Iron Prometheus
